comments.body:
Shall we add the Hive 1.2.1 example back after this for users?
```
# With Hive 1.2.1 support
./build/mvn -Pyarn -Phive -Phive-thriftserver -Phive-1.2 -DskipTests clean package
```
OK either way. I guess we kind of want to discourage Hive 1.x, but doesn't mean it should have a line in the docs still

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +87,91 @@
    # With Hive 2.3.6 support
    ./build/mvn -Pyarn -Phive -Phive-thriftserver -DskipTests clean package

## Packaging without Hadoop Dependencies for YARN

comments.body:
~Ur, shall we revert this line since there is Python 3.7 and 3.8?~
Oops, Never mind.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +67,71 @@    ./dev/make-distribution.sh --name custom-spark --pip --r --tgz -Psparkr -Phive -Phive-thriftserver -Pmesos -Pyarn -Pkubernetes

This will build Spark distribution along with Python pip and R packages. (Note that build with Python pip package requires Python 3.6). For more information on usage, run `./dev/make-distribution.sh --help`

## Specifying the Hadoop Version and Enabling YARN

comments.body: nit: I think we can just say "Note that build with Python pip package requires Python 3." without parentheses.
